Tavatron/Hysteria

Tavatron fired an optic blast at Scattershot's weapon and two more at his 
feet (propulsion system). She had to protect her commander, at any cost.

*****

Hysteria tapped out a few commands on her own console. Chordate was right. 
The small gestalt had mangaged to do some damage to the hull, but not enough 
to be concerned with right now:

"Hull integrity just dropped to 79.5% and holding. If it drops below 60% we 
may have a problem."

They needed the main console, but without the proper equipment there was 
nothing she or Chordate couldn't do about it. She got the impretion he 
didn't really want her here, well tough. With the lockdown in effect she 
wasn't going anywhere.
